definition: inhibiting or blocking the action of acetylcholine at a receptor site, a substance that opposes or blocks the action of acetylcholine
details:
adjective
- inhibiting or blocking the action of acetylcholine at a receptor site
= example: inhibiting or blocking the action of acetylcholine at a receptor site
noun
- a substance that opposes or blocks the action of acetylcholine
= synonyms: anticholinergic drug
